### Regex  
First, load the required packages and import the dataset. 
```{r}
library(dplyr)

MData <- read.csv("./InputData/A4_MAHRTSMITH_AMELIE.csv", header = TRUE)
```

Create a new dataset with a column containing the abbreviated genus for each organism. 
```{r}
MData <- MData %>%
  mutate(Sp = gsub("(\\w)\\w+(.*)", "\\1\\.\\2", MData$Organism)) %>%  #create column 'Sp' with 'Organism' genus abbreviated
  select(Sp, Limb.width:Observer)  #replace 'Organism' with 'Sp' as first column

write.csv(MData, "./Output/MeasShort.csv")  #save as new file in 'Output' folder
```
